```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
elections <- read.csv("../elections/extended_elections.csv")
data <- read.csv("data_per_capita.csv")
```


```{r}
data_with_elections <- left_join(data, elections, by=c("year", "municipality_id")) %>% select(-c(municipality_name, X))
write.csv(data_with_elections, "data_with_elections.csv")
```
